item.title: Introduction to my devblog
item.description: Welcome to my blog where I will be writing tutorials and posts about my experiences creating games with my team as the main programmer.

item.title: Using finite state machines to build scalable player controllers
item.description: Explaining how I use the finite state machine design model to write my player controllers to easily add features without sacrificing code quality.
item.author: m.bitzos@gmail.com (Michael Bitzos)

item.title: Creating dynamic animations programmatically with Unity coroutines
item.description: How using coroutines in Unity allows you to create dynamic animations purely with code to build complex features quickly and easily.
item.author: m.bitzos@gmail.com (Michael Bitzos)

item.title: Creating persistent in-game debug settings for rapid small-team development
item.description: Discussing how I created and utilized a debug tool to modify game settings at run-time to improve the efficiency of my team's development process.
item.author: m.bitzos@gmail.com (Michael Bitzos)

item.title: Implementing satisfying stairs for your 2D top-down game
